name: Derpminators
description:
This is Party Game Shooter in which the character you control may Derp at any time! He may Derp walking, shooting, jumping... he is very clumsy :S

We made this game at a Game Jam! Called Jam.Ar in March of 2015 :D

With the Theme "BAD LUCK"

#JamPuntoAr

Keyboard
Player 1 Controls
Move: W A S D
Shoot : G

Player 2 Controls
Move: Arrows
Shoot : L

XBOX gamepads compatible!
- You can toggle (on/off) extra characters: Numbers 3 & 4 (only available using gamepads)

Team:

  • Juan Afonso @ClairvoyanceDev
  • Federico Jose de Tezanos Pinto @FedericoDETP
  • Martin Mcgil @MartinMcGil
  • Cob cris @cobcris
